user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to access a loan application form so that I can apply for a loan.
acceptance_criteria: The user can access the loan application form.
The loan application form includes fields for personal information, loan amount, loan purpose, and employment details.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to submit my loan application so that it can be reviewed.
acceptance_criteria: The user can submit the loan application form.
The system validates the required fields before submission.
The system confirms the submission with a message.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive a confirmation email after submitting my loan application so that I have a record of my submission.
acceptance_criteria: The user receives an email confirmation after submitting the loan application.
The email includes a summary of the loan application details.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to check the status of my loan application so that I can stay informed about the progress.
acceptance_criteria: The user can view the status of their loan application.
The status includes stages such as 'Pending', 'Approved', 'Rejected'.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be notified when the status of my loan application changes so that I can take appropriate actions.
acceptance_criteria: The user is notified via email when the status of their loan application changes.
The email includes the new status and any relevant notes.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to know which documents are required for the loan application so that I can prepare them in advance.
acceptance_criteria: The user can view a list of required documents for the loan application.
The list includes documents such as ID, proof of address, and income statements.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to upload the required documents so that they can be reviewed with my loan application.
acceptance_criteria: The user can upload the required documents.
The system accepts common file formats such as PDF, JPG, and PNG.
The system confirms the successful upload of each document.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to check the status of my uploaded documents so that I can ensure all required documents are accepted.
acceptance_criteria: The user can view the status of each uploaded document.
The status includes 'Pending', 'Accepted', 'Rejected'.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view the loan terms and conditions so that I can understand the details of the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The user can view a summary of the loan terms and conditions.
The summary includes interest rate, repayment period, and any applicable fees.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to accept the loan terms and conditions so that I can proceed with the loan application process.
acceptance_criteria: The user can accept the loan terms and conditions.
The system records the user's acceptance.
The user can proceed to the next steps after accepting the terms.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view the loan repayment schedule so that I can plan my finances accordingly.
acceptance_criteria: The user can view the loan repayment schedule.
The schedule includes the amount and due date for each installment.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to set up automatic payments so that I can ensure timely loan repayments.
acceptance_criteria: The user can set up automatic payments for the loan repayment.
The system allows the user to link a bank account for automatic deductions.
The system confirms the setup of automatic payments.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be notified before each loan repayment due date so that I can ensure I have sufficient funds.
acceptance_criteria: The user is notified via email before each loan repayment due date.
The email includes the amount due and the due date.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to access a loan application form so that I can apply for a loan.
acceptance_criteria: A loan application form is displayed.
The form includes fields for personal information, loan amount, loan purpose, and other relevant details.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to submit my loan application so that it can be reviewed.
acceptance_criteria: The submitted loan application is stored in the system.
A confirmation message is displayed to the user.
The loan application is queued for review.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive a confirmation email after submitting my loan application so that I have a record of my submission.
acceptance_criteria: A confirmation email is sent to the user's registered email address.
The email includes details of the submitted loan application.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to check the status of my loan application so that I can stay informed about the progress.
acceptance_criteria: The current status of the loan application is displayed.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to check the status of my uploaded documents so that I can ensure all required documents are accepted.
acceptance_criteria: The status of each uploaded document is displayed.

The selected loan type should be clearly displayed on the application.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to calculate the estimated loan payments so that I can plan my finances accordingly.
acceptance_criteria: The loan calculator should ask for the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.
The loan calculator should provide an estimated monthly payment.
The loan calculator should be accessible before and during the application process.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to track the status of my loan application so that I can stay informed about the progress of my application.
acceptance_criteria: The application status should be accessible online.
The status should be updated in real-time.
The status should provide clear information about the current stage of the application.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to communicate securely with the loan provider so that my personal information is protected.
acceptance_criteria: The communication channel should be encrypted.
The user should be able to send and receive messages securely.
The user should be notified of any new messages.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to sign my loan application electronically so that I can complete the application process quickly and securely.
acceptance_criteria: The e-signature process should be secure.
The e-signature should be legally binding.
The user should be able to review the application before signing.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to upload and manage the documents required for my loan application so that I can keep track of all necessary documents.
acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to upload documents securely.
The user should be able to view and manage uploaded documents.
The system should notify the user of any missing or incomplete documents.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan provider, I want to manage the loan applications so that I can process them efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: The loan provider should be able to view all submitted applications.
The loan provider should be able to update the status of applications.
The loan provider should be able to communicate with the applicant securely.

user_stories.user_story: As a loan provider, I want to disburse the loan amount to the approved applicants so that they can receive their funds.
acceptance_criteria: The loan provider should be able to initiate the disbursement process.
The applicant should be notified of the disbursement.
The funds should be transferred securely to the applicant's account.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to make loan repayments online so that I can manage my loan conveniently.
acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to view their repayment schedule.
The user should be able to make payments securely online.
The user should be notified of successful payments.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to access customer support so that I can get help with my loan application or repayment.
acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to contact customer support through multiple channels.
The user should receive a timely response from customer support.
The user should be able to provide feedback on the support received.

user_stories.user_story: As a lender, I want to be able to reduce the total loan amount, suspend the borrower's right to use the credit, or not propose to renew the contract when the elements collected under the provisions of article L. 312-75 justify it or, at any time, if I have information demonstrating a decrease in the borrower's creditworthiness as assessed at the time of the conclusion of the contract.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow the lender to reduce the total loan amount.
The system should allow the lender to suspend the borrower's right to use the credit.
The system should allow the lender to not propose to renew the contract.

user_stories.user_story: As a lender, I want to be able to restore the total loan amount and lift the suspension of the right to use the credit at any time, at my initiative or at the borrower's request, after verifying the borrower's creditworthiness under the conditions set out in Article L. 312-16.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow the lender to restore the total loan amount.
The system should allow the lender to lift the suspension of the right to use the credit.

user_stories.user_story:
As a lender, when I offer a borrower an insurance contract to guarantee, in the event of the occurrence of one of the risks that this contract defines, either the total or partial repayment of the outstanding loan amount or the payment of all or part of the loan instalments, I want the following provisions to be mandatory:
1. A notice enumerating the risks covered and specifying all the terms of the insurance coverage must be annexed to the loan contract.
2. Any subsequent modification of the definition of the risks covered, the terms of the insurance coverage or the pricing of the contract must be unenforceable against the borrower who has not given his acceptance.
3. Where the insurer has made its guarantee subject to the approval of the insured's person and such approval is not given, the loan contract must be terminated as of right at the borrower's request without any fees or penalties.
acceptance_criteria: The system should generate a notice enumerating the risks covered and specifying all the terms of the insurance coverage to be annexed to the loan contract.

The system should ensure that any subsequent modification of the definition of the risks covered, the terms of the insurance coverage or the pricing of the contract is unenforceable against the borrower who has not given his acceptance.

The system should allow the loan contract to be terminated as of right at the borrower's request without any fees or penalties if the insurer has made its guarantee subject to the approval of the insured's person and such approval is not given.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to apply for a loan for various projects so that I can get funding for my specific needs.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to select the type of project they are applying for.
The system should display a list of required documents based on the selected project type.
The system should allow users to upload the required documents.
The system should allow users to submit the loan application.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to simulate a real estate project so that I can estimate the loan amount and repayment schedule.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to input details about their real estate project.
The system should provide a simulation of the loan amount, interest rate, and repayment schedule based on the project details.
The system should allow users to adjust the project details and see the updated simulation.
The system should allow users to save the simulation results for future reference.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to integrate my personal contribution so that it is included in the loan calculation.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to input their personal contribution amount.
The system should integrate the personal contribution into the loan calculation.
The system should display the total loan amount including the personal contribution.
The system should allow users to adjust their personal contribution and see the updated loan amount.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want transparent loan information so that I can make informed decisions about my loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display all relevant loan information in a clear and transparent manner.
The system should provide details about the loan amount, interest rate, repayment schedule, and any associated fees.
The system should allow users to download or print the loan information for their records.
The system should ensure that the loan information is up-to-date and accurate.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want my solvency to be verified so that I can determine my eligibility for the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to input their financial information.
The system should verify the user's solvency based on the provided financial information.
The system should provide a solvency report indicating the user's eligibility for the loan.
The system should allow users to update their financial information and re-verify their solvency.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to apply for a loan so that I can access funds for my needs.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide an option to apply for a loan.
The system should guide the user through the loan application process.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to select the type of loan I am applying for so that the application process is tailored to my needs.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display different loan types (e.g., personal loan, car loan, mortgage).
The system should allow the user to select one loan type.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to request credit for purchasing a bike so that I can finance my bike purchase.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide an option to request bike credit.
The system should guide the user through the bike credit request process.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to provide my personal information so that the loan application can be processed accurately.
acceptance_criteria: The system should collect personal information such as name, address, contact details, etc.
The system should validate the personal information provided.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to provide my financial information so that my loan eligibility can be determined.
acceptance_criteria: The system should collect financial information such as income, expenses, assets, liabilities, etc.
The system should validate the financial information provided.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to provide information specific to the loan I am applying for so that the application can be processed accurately.
acceptance_criteria: The system should collect loan-specific information based on the loan type selected.
The system should validate the loan-specific information provided.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to upload the required documents so that my loan application can be verified.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow the user to upload documents such as ID, proof of address, income statements, etc.
The system should validate the uploaded documents.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to check my loan eligibility so that I know if I qualify for the loan.
acceptance_criteria: The system should perform an eligibility check based on the information provided.
The system should display the eligibility status to the user.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to simulate different loan scenarios so that I can make an informed decision.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow the user to input different loan parameters (e.g., amount, term, interest rate).
The system should display the simulation results based on the input parameters.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view a summary of my loan application so that I can review and confirm the details.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display a summary of the loan application details.
The system should allow the user to confirm or edit the details.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to submit my loan application so that it can be processed by the lender.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow the user to submit the loan application.
The system should confirm the submission to the user.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive updates on my loan application status so that I am informed about the progress.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide real-time updates on the loan application status.
The system should notify the user of any changes in the application status.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to accept or modify the loan offer so that I can finalize the loan agreement.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display the loan offer details.
The system should allow the user to accept or modify the loan offer.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to sign the loan agreement electronically so that the loan can be disbursed.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide an option for electronic signing of the loan agreement.
The system should confirm the successful signing of the loan agreement.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view the loan amortization schedule so that I can plan my repayments.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display the loan amortization schedule.
The system should allow the user to view and download the amortization schedule.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to make loan payments so that I can repay the loan on time.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide options for making loan payments.
The system should confirm the successful payment.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view my loan statement so that I can track my loan balance and payments.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display the loan statement.
The system should allow the user to view and download the loan statement.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to understand the difference between a revolving credit and a Multi-Project Loan so that I can choose the type of credit that best suits my financial needs.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide clear and concise information about revolving credit and Multi-Project Loans.
The system should highlight the key differences between the two credit types, such as interest rates, repayment terms, and use cases.
The system should offer a comparison tool or summary to help users make an informed decision.
The system should allow users to select their preferred credit type based on their financial needs and the provided information.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the option to repay my loan early without any fees so that I can manage my finances more flexibly.
acceptance_criteria: The system must allow users to repay their loans early without incurring any additional fees.  The system must clearly communicate to users that early repayment is an available option.  The system must update the loan balance in real-time to reflect early repayments.  The system must provide users with a confirmation of their early repayment and the updated loan status.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the ability to defer my loan payments by one or two months per year so that I can better manage my cash flow during tight financial periods.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to defer their loan payments by one or two months per year.
The deferment option should be easily accessible and clearly explained within the loan management interface.
Users should receive confirmation of their deferred payment and be informed of the new payment schedule.
The system should ensure that deferring payments does not negatively impact the user's credit score or result in additional fees.
The deferment feature should be integrated with the user's cash flow management tools to provide a comprehensive view of their financial situation.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to finance multiple projects with a single loan solution so that I can simplify my credit management.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to finance multiple projects through a single loan solution.
The system should enable users to manage their credit more efficiently by consolidating multiple projects under a single loan.

user_stories.user_story: As a young user, I want access to financing options tailored to my needs so that I can realize my projects.
acceptance_criteria: The financing options should include specific types of loans or credit facilities that are commonly relevant to young users, such as student loans, first-time home buyer programs, or startup business loans.

The criteria for these options to be considered 'tailored' should be clearly defined. For example, tailored financing options could mean personalized interest rates based on the user's credit history, flexible repayment terms that accommodate the user's income, or special programs designed for specific needs like education or entrepreneurship.
The user story should specify what constitutes a 'young user'. For instance, a young user could be defined as an individual between the ages of 18 and 30.
The financing options should be easily accessible and clearly presented to the user, with tools or guides to help them understand and choose the best option for their needs.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want financing options for vehicle purchases so that I can easily acquire vehicles, especially cleaner ones.
acceptance_criteria: Financing options are available for vehicle purchases.
Cleaner vehicles are prioritized or have special financing options.
Users can easily access and understand the financing options for vehicle purchases.
The financing process for vehicle purchases is streamlined and user-friendly.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want the option to make early repayments without any penalties so that I can reduce my debt faster if I have extra funds.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow borrowers to make early repayments without any penalties.
Early repayments should be applied directly to the principal amount, reducing the overall debt.
The system should update the loan balance and remaining payment schedule in real-time after an early repayment is made.
Borrowers should receive a confirmation notification after an early repayment is successfully processed.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want the ability to defer my loan payments for one or two months each year so that I can manage my finances better during difficult times.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow borrowers to defer their loan payments for one month each year.
The system should allow borrowers to defer their loan payments for two months each year.
The system should provide clear communication to the borrower about the deferment process and its impact on their loan terms.
The system should update the loan schedule to reflect the deferred payments and adjust the remaining payments accordingly.
The system should notify the borrower once the deferment period ends and regular payments resume.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to understand the difference between a revolving credit and a Multi-Project Loan so that I can choose the most suitable credit type for my financial needs.
As a user, I want the option to repay my loan early without any fees so that I can manage my finances more flexibly.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to repay their loans early without incurring any additional fees.
The early repayment option should be clearly communicated to the user during the loan application process.
The system should provide a confirmation message to the user once the early repayment is successfully processed.
The system should update the user's account balance and loan status in real-time to reflect the early repayment.
The system should ensure that no hidden fees or charges are applied to the user's account after the early repayment is processed.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the ability to defer my loan installments by one or two months per year so that I can manage my financial obligations more effectively.
acceptance_criteria: The system allows users to defer up to two installments per year.
The system provides clear guidelines on which installments can be deferred (e.g., not the first or last installment).
The deferral option does not conflict with early repayment options or other loan management features.
The user is informed of any interest or fees associated with deferring installments.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to secure financing for multiple projects with a single loan solution so that I can simplify my credit management.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to apply for a single loan that covers multiple projects.
The loan application process should be streamlined to handle multiple projects at once.
Users should be able to manage their credit for all included projects through a single interface.
The system should provide clear information on the terms and conditions of the single loan covering multiple projects.
Users should be able to track the status of their loan application and the approved loan details within the system.

user_stories.user_story: As a young individual, I want access to financing options tailored to my needs so that I can realize my projects more easily.
acceptance_criteria: Financing options should include specific loan types such as student loans, personal loans, and auto loans.
A 'young individual' is defined as someone between the ages of 18 and 30.
'Projects' refer to educational pursuits, personal endeavors, or entrepreneurial ventures.
'Tailored to my needs' means the financing options should consider the individual's credit history, income, and the specific project requirements.
The system should provide a recommendation for the most suitable financing option based on the individual's profile and project details.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want financing options for vehicle purchases, especially for cleaner vehicles, so that I can acquire a vehicle more easily.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide financing options for vehicle purchases.
The financing options should prioritize cleaner vehicles.
The process for acquiring a vehicle through financing should be straightforward.

user_stories.user_story: As a young customer, I want to understand the difference between a revolving credit and a Multi-Project Loan so that I can choose the credit type that best fits my financial needs.
acceptance_criteria: The user story should provide a clear and concise explanation of the differences between a revolving credit and a Multi-Project Loan.
The explanation should highlight the key features, benefits, and drawbacks of each credit type.
The information should be presented in a format that is easy for a young customer to understand, such as a comparison table or infographic.
The user story should include real-life examples or scenarios to illustrate how each credit type might be used.
The explanation should be accessible through the bank's website or mobile app, ensuring that young customers can easily find and understand the information.
The user story should provide clear guidance on how to choose the best credit type based on the customer's financial needs and goals.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want the option to repay my loan early without any fees so that I can manage my finances more flexibly.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow borrowers to repay their loans early without incurring any fees.
The system should update the loan status to 'closed' once the early repayment is processed.
The system should send a confirmation notification to the borrower once the early repayment is successfully processed.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want the option to defer my loan installments by one or two months per year so that I can manage my cash flow better during tight financial periods.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow borrowers to defer their loan installments by one or two months per year.
The deferral process should be easy to initiate and complete, with clear instructions provided to the borrower.
The system should update the loan schedule to reflect the deferred installments and adjust future payments accordingly.
The system should notify the borrower of the successful deferral and provide updated loan information.
The system should prevent borrowers from deferring installments more than the allowed number of months per year.

user_stories.user_story: As a customer with multiple projects, I want to secure financing for all my projects with a single loan so that I can simplify my credit management.
acceptance_criteria: A customer with multiple projects can apply for a single loan to cover all their projects.
The loan application process allows the customer to specify all projects that need financing.
The loan approval process considers the combined financial needs of all specified projects.
Once approved, the loan funds are disbursed to cover all specified projects.
The customer receives a simplified credit management interface that shows the single loan covering all projects.

user_stories.user_story: As a young customer, I want to access financing options tailored to my specific needs so that I can achieve my projects.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide a list of financing options tailored to the young customer's specific needs.
The financing options should include details such as loan amount, interest rate, repayment terms, and any applicable fees.
The system should allow the young customer to filter and sort the financing options based on their preferences, such as lowest interest rate, longest repayment term, or smallest monthly payment.
The system should provide a comparison tool that allows the young customer to compare up to three financing options side by side.
The system should provide clear explanations of each financing option, including the benefits and potential drawbacks.
The system should allow the young customer to select a financing option and proceed to the application process.
The system should verify the young customer's eligibility for each financing option before displaying it as an option.

The system should provide a 'Why didn't I qualify?' feature that explains why the young customer did not qualify for a particular financing option and provides tips for improving their eligibility in the future.

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to understand the difference between a revolving credit and a Multi-Project Loan so that I can choose the most suitable credit type for my financial needs.
acceptance_criteria: The information provided should clearly explain the differences between a revolving credit and a Multi-Project Loan.
The explanation should be presented in a way that is easy for customers to understand and compare the two credit types.
The information should highlight the key features, benefits, and potential drawbacks of each credit type.
The explanation should include examples or scenarios where one credit type may be more suitable than the other.
The information should be accessible and prominently displayed on the website or application where customers can easily find it.

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want the option to repay my loan early without any fees so that I can manage my finances more flexibly.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow customers to repay their loans early without incurring any penalties or additional fees.
The early repayment option should be clearly communicated to the customer during the loan application process.
The system should update the loan balance and remaining payment schedule in real-time upon early repayment.
The customer should receive a confirmation notification after successfully completing an early repayment.

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want the ability to defer my loan payments by one or two months per year so that I can manage my financial obligations more effectively.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow customers to defer their loan payments by one or two months per year.
The deferment option should be easily accessible and understandable to the customer.
The system should provide clear information about the terms and conditions of the deferment, including any additional fees or interest that may apply.
The system should allow customers to request deferment through their online account or mobile app.
The system should notify customers of the approval or rejection of their deferment request.
The system should update the loan payment schedule to reflect the deferment period.

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to finance multiple projects with a single loan solution so that I can simplify my credit management.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow customers to combine multiple projects into a single loan application.
Customers should be able to add or remove projects from their loan application before submission.
The loan application process should provide a summary of all included projects with their respective costs.
The system should calculate the total loan amount based on the combined costs of all included projects.
The system should allow customers to adjust the loan parameters (e.g., term, interest rate) and see the impact on their monthly payments.
Customers should be able to submit their multi-project loan application for review and approval.
The system should provide notifications to customers about the status of their loan application and any required actions.
The system should integrate with existing credit management tools to simplify the tracking and management of the multi-project loan.

user_stories.user_story: As a young customer, I want access to financing options tailored to my needs so that I can realize my projects.
acceptance_criteria: The system provides financing options tailored to the needs of young customers.
The financing options help young customers realize their projects.
The financing options are accessible to young customers.

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want financing options for purchasing vehicles, especially cleaner vehicles, so that I can acquire a vehicle more easily.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide clear and detailed information about the available financing options for purchasing vehicles, with a focus on cleaner vehicles.
The financing options should include details such as interest rates, loan terms, and any special promotions or discounts for cleaner vehicles.
The system should allow customers to compare different financing options side by side.
The system should provide a calculator to estimate monthly payments and total cost based on the selected financing option.
The system should allow customers to apply for financing directly through the platform, with a clear and user-friendly application process.
The system should provide real-time updates on the status of the financing application, with notifications at each stage of the process.
The system should provide clear information about any additional fees or charges associated with the financing options.
The system should provide information about any eligibility requirements or restrictions for the financing options.
The system should provide clear information about any additional fees or charges associated with the financing options.
